backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor definition serving as the backend entry point.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three implemented features for displaying technician work photos in the Hardware Repairs, Networking, and Data Recovery sections of the Services component.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-existing summaries of frontend files describing the React application structure with header, hero, services, products, AMC sections, footer, and styling configuration.
frontend/index.css: Empty CSS file (global styles are configured via Tailwind).
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script loading main.tsx for the HIZMET IT Services application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component composing the full page layout with Header, Hero, Services, Products, AMC, and Footer components.
frontend/src/components/AMC.tsx: Annual Maintenance Contract section displaying three benefits (priority support, preventive maintenance, cost-effective replacements) in a centered card with checkmark icons.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying company address, three contact phone numbers, business hours, copyright notice, and caffeine.ai attribution link with UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header with logo and responsive navigation menu (desktop horizontal, mobile collapsible) providing smooth scroll to page sections.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section with background image overlay, headline, description, and two CTA buttons for calling and booking visits.
frontend/src/components/Products.tsx: Products section showcasing three hardware categories (laptops, custom desktops, peripherals) with images in a responsive card grid.
frontend/src/components/Services.tsx: Services section displaying five IT service offerings with real technician work photos for Hardware Repairs, Networking, and Data Recovery, and generated icons for Printer Solutions and Software Sales.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook managing ICP backend actor creation with Internet Identity authentication, query caching, and automatic invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Custom React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a comprehensive design system including colors, spacing, and theme tokens for both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication context.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the default theme with custom colors using OKLCH color space, typography, container queries, animations, and design tokens for a comprehensive UI system.
project_state.json: Project state file documenting HIZMET IT Services website features including navigation, hero section, services (hardware repair, networking, data recovery), product sales, and AMC offerings for Delhi customers.
